newsitem.title: MALAYSIA: MALAYSIA STOCKS - factors to watch - June 26.
newsitem.headline: MALAYSIA STOCKS - factors to watch - June 26.

text.p: Following are some of the main factors likely to affect Malaysian stocks on Thursday:
* The volatile Dow Jones Industrial Average ended lower on Wednesday in a late sell-off. It closed down 68 at 7,690.
* The Kuala Lumpur Stock Exchange blue-chip index ended down 7.96 points at 1,069.96.
* Finance sector stocks expected to face more profit-taking
* "With the Dow down, the Composite Index down, I think the bias is towards going lower. I think the Composite Index is heading for 1,050 support," a local brokerage dealer said.
* Dealers said the index could rebound from 1,050 level, but for now volumes to remain thin
* Maybank expected to lead finance stocks down
* The gains will be restricted to stocks in play due to rumours or announcements, the dealers said.
* Foreswood Group and North Borneo Timber shares expected to be among shares in play
